sources.title: Diamond Head (1962) Charlton Heston Â· George Chakiris
sources.description: Richard Howland is a wealthy white man in Hawaii. The locals hold him in high esteem. When his sister falls in love with a Black student, his pride is shattered. Then his Hawaiian lover confesses that she is pregnant with his child. .

metadata.Plot: Rich Hawaiian pineapple grower and US Senatorial candidate Richard Howland tries to control everything and everyone around him, including his headstrong sister, Slone. Howland learns the hard way that money and power cannot buy love and happiness.
metadata.Actors: Charlton Heston, Yvette Mimieux, George Chakiris
